Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:End of Culture
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
This is the End of Culture for the entire world as the dominion of Yomi will spread chaos into neighboring provinces. Spawn rate of Oni, both from temples under friendly dominion and from Oni generals will be greatly increased.
